notes: Official file hub for ICD-10-CM releases (FY2019+), includes addenda and guidelines.
Landing page and browser tool for ICD-10-CM; authoritative context and navigation.
Multi-year web app for code lookup; FY2025 includes April 1, 2025 addenda.
ICD-10 Coordination and Maintenance Committee meeting schedules and materials.
Primary CMS ICD-10 page with current-year PCS/CM files and archives; updated regularly.
Official 2025 PCS coding guidelines PDF (hospital inpatient procedures).
Official FY2025 CM guidelines PDF (diagnosis coding).
Definitions Manual and software, including MCE and version tables (e.g., v43 FY2026).
IPPS final rule resources; often includes DRG relative weights and policy updates.
Quarterly PTP edit files for practitioner and hospital outpatient claims.
Medically Unlikely Edits policy page with current and archived download links.
Official external code list for Claim Adjustment Reason Codes (CARCs).
Official external code list for Remittance Advice Remark Codes (RARCs).

source: HL7 FHIR Bulk Data Access IG
notes: Official Bulk Data (Flat FHIR) Implementation Guide landing page (export/import, backend services, scopes).

source: HL7 FHIR Bulk Data Export Project
notes: Project page with background, auth model, client/server implementations, and references.
Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange IG index (profiles, vocabulary, examples).
Abstract parent profile with common constraints across C4BB EOB profiles.
Profile for inpatient institutional EOBs.
Profile for pharmacy (retail) EOBs.
Profile for professional & non-clinician EOBs.

source: Azure AI Search Hybrid Search Overview
notes: Concepts and architecture for hybrid (keyword + vector) search.

source: Azure AI Search Hybrid Query How-To
notes: How to submit hybrid queries; parallel execution & result fusion.

source: Azure AI Search Vector Search Overview
notes: Vector support model, fields, and workflows for vector search.
Reciprocal Rank Fusion (RRF) details for hybrid ranking.
Stateful Responses API overview, getting started, REST examples, model/region notes.
Official tutorial for generating embeddings; includes REST, Python, C#, PowerShell.
Migration guidance for embeddings moving from OpenAI 0.28 to 1.x.
Landing page lists 2025 ZIPs: Codes File, Conversion Table, Code Tables & Index, Addendum.
Page hosts the ICD-10 MS-DRG Definitions Manual (Text Version) ZIP and related software for current FY/versions.

source: Change Healthcare 2022 Revenue Cycle Denials Index
notes: ~441M hospital claim remits, $500B charges, 1,500+ hospitals; H1 2022 initial denial rate ~12% (9% 2016, 10% 2020); Pacific region 17%; Registration/Eligibility top cause 22%; front-end share 41% (down from 46%); avoidable denials 31% with 43% non-recoverable; root cause distributions (coordination of benefits 45% within Reg/Elig avoidables).

source: CAQH CORE Health Care Claims Issue Brief 2023
notes: Highlights 2022 initial denial rate (~12% vs 10% 2020, 9% 2016) and opportunities to standardize X12N 837 & 277CA data content to reduce first-pass denials; discusses VBP, SDOH, telehealth POS variability.

source: HFMA Claim Integrity KPI Standardization (Six Denial Metrics)
notes: Defines six standardized claim integrity KPIs: Initial Denial Rate (volume & dollars), Primary Denial Rate, Denial Write-Off % (NPSR), Time to Appeal (initial denial to appeal submission), Time to Resolution (initial denial to final adjudication), % Initial Denials Overturned (charge/volume/obs variants) with purposes & formulas.

source: HFMA MAP Keys – Revenue Cycle KPIs Portal
notes: Broader MAP Keys set (Patient Access, Pre-Billing, Claims, Account Resolution, Financial Mgmt). Includes Remittance Denial Rate (AR-5), Denial Write-Off % (AR-6), Clean Claim Rate, DNFB, FBNS, A/R Aging, Net Days in A/R, Cost to Collect – contextualizes claim integrity metrics within enterprise performance framework.

source: Optum 2024 Revenue Cycle Denials Index Landing (Gated)
notes: 2024 landing referencing continued rise in denial rates; gated e-book (data not directly extractable). Provides recency anchor but not used for quantitative citation until full source ingested.

source: OS Healthcare Measuring the Cost of Denials (Secondary)
notes: Secondary synthesis citing Change Healthcare: cost per denied claim ~$117 (other estimates $25–$50); ~65% denied claims never resubmitted; 90%+ potentially preventable emphasis; advocates prevention focus.
Concise restatement of six claim integrity KPIs and formulas (mirror of HFMA definitions) – used only for corroborative phrasing, not primary formulas.

source: Chief Healthcare Executive – Review of Denial Trends (Secondary)
notes: Article summarizing Change Healthcare Denials Index scope (441M remits, $500B charges, 1,500 hospitals) and strategic prevention themes; supports cross-source corroboration.
Access control (unique user ID, emergency access, auto logoff, encryption), audit controls, integrity, authentication, transmission security requirements impacting CDI/RCM systems handling ePHI.

source: CMS Case Mix Index Definition Page
notes: Defines Case Mix Index: average DRG relative weight (sum DRG weights / discharges); updated annually; underscores documentation & CC/MCC capture importance.
Industry gold-standard practice brief for compliant, non-leading physician query processes; drives standardized query auditing and response expectations.

source: Nuance DAX / Dragon Medical One Product Page
notes: Nuance Ambient Clinical Intelligence (DAX) + Dragon Medical One; focus on real-time ambient note generation & physician workflow efficiency; claims reduced documentation burden and improved capture quality (CDI adjacency).
3M 360 Encompass integrates CDI, computer-assisted coding, quality metrics, and analytics; emphasis on comprehensive workflow unification and compliant query management.

AI-driven prioritization using machine learning signals to surface likely undocumented conditions (sepsis, respiratory failure, etc.); strong marketing around predictive accuracy & physician query efficiency.
Focus on denial prevention & analytics across root causes; emphasizes predictive insights, automation, and process standardization for reduced write-offs.
Optum positions analytics + workflow + specialized services to lower denial rates and accelerate recovery; highlights end-to-end denial lifecycle visibility.
Cloudmed (R1) portfolio includes underpayment recovery, denials analytics, and coding optimization; strength in data mining & recovery services augmentation.
CorroHealth provides coding, CDI, utilization review, and appeals support; blends human expert services with technology; appeals turnaround and win-rate emphasized.
Specializes in complex claims/underpayments and denials resolution; strong positioning in payer contract analytics and niche appeal expertise.
Fusion CDI + CAC (computer-assisted coding) integrates workflow management, query tracking, and analytics; marketing around improved query compliance and coder productivity.
